name: Candy Heart Sugar
description:
Anna and Lee need your help planning the perfect date. Help Anna dress, choose a movie for later, and find the perfect spot for a romantic picnic.

In this Valentine's-themed sequel to Candy Cane Sugar, match the hearts, candies, donuts and other sweet treats to beat the score goals. Avoid obstacles and falling blockers, helped along by exploding candies in this fun casual game.

There are three goal targets: activate the first star to avoid losing; activate the third to win the level. When you have completed the story, relax in the Zen Garden for endless play.

Programming: Jo Weber

Music: JBD Artist, Frankum, Nicolas Jeudy (Dark Fantasy Studio)

SoundFX: SunnySideSound, Retainna, Soughtaftersounds @ Freesound

Tutorials, additional resources: Wilmer Lin, James Doyle

Art: Ricimi Designs, Poneti, Erik Hardenbol, Zhenilex, Yuqio LLC
